name: BossClicker
description:
A simple clicker game made out of boredom. Click to kill your opponent, get money to buy upgrades and better weapons. The game has 6 different levels of weapons. Competitive system through scoreboard made with LootLocker app. The game is paused in development due to the change to the Godot engine. The game is fully free, in case of bugs please leave a comment.

"HPCALC" is a function button in the case of older versions to recalculate the old health script to the new script.
For any help join my discord or on my DM BoyBACKS#2137.
